text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
That's all. I'm sorry, but I don't think<n>the way you've been
having me run<n>is...

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I see... I'm sorry as well. It looks like I<n>put you through a lot.
And you, young<n>trainer—I must thank you for looking<n>out
for her when I could not.
choice_data_list:
I'm counting on you to put her strengths to
good use.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I do wish to do that... But you see, I'm<n>quite set in my ways
as a trainer, and<n>I'm afraid that I will cause her to feel<n>
trapped again.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka, why don't you consider<n>transferring your contract
over to this<n>trainer?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eh? A transfer?

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I know that way you'll get much<n>more flexible
guidance. I can see that<n>this trainer respects you very much,<n>
and that's a wonderful thing.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um... W-would that be all right with<n>you? I mean...
choice_data_list: If that's what you want, then I want it too!
If that's what you want, then I want it too!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Of course it's what I want! Thank you<n>so much... Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Good for you, Suzuka! I can't wait to<n>see the fine racer you
are sure to<n>become.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Just know that, should you ever take<n>on any of my trainees,
I'll be cheering<n>harder for them. I do hope you'll be<n>ready.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Of course!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Um... I know that we just made things<n>official, but what
should we do about<n>the debut race I was supposed to run<n>
in next month?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka fidgets about nervously, but<n>her eyes are full of
fiery determination.<n>It wouldn't make sense to extinguish<n>
that.
choice_data_list: You can run in the race, just as planned.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh, really? Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: In that case... what should we do<n>about my running style?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I've come to understand that my<n>runaway style comes with
its risks.<n>And one day, I may no longer be able<n>to keep
myself in the lead.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I can't deny that she's correct in her<n>thinking. However...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I... need to run in the lead.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
...I need to reach that place, even if<n>it's just once more! I
don't care<n>about anything else!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's so obsessed with being in the<n>lead... In this respect,
she already<n>possesses a strength that's second<n>to none.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If there exists potential beyond the<n>limits of Umamusume,
then it would be<n>achieved by Suzuka!
choice_data_list: Let's stick to what you're good at.
Let's stick to what you're good at.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Starting out of the gate in the lead and<n>not giving it up even
once... I let her<n>know that it will be difficult, but by no<n>
means impossible.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: So that means... You believe in my<n>running.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Thank you. I'll prove that your faith is<n>well-placed.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With a strategy set, we're ready to<n>begin training for her
debut race in<n>earnest.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Leading at the start of a race and not<n>losing speed even in
the latter half...<n>How can I achieve that?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I've been told that we have limited<n>energy for speed, so we
need to run<n>in a way that conserves it.
choice_data_list: We'll just have to up your energy reserves then.
We'll just have to up your energy reserves then.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I suggest ramp training as a way for<n>her to strengthen both
the muscles<n>that exert explosive force and those<n>that
govern stamina.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Ramp training? Understood. Although...<n>I'm not sure if the
academy course is<n>enough of a challenge.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Maybe we could... climb a mountain<n>or something? What do
you think?
choice_data_list: (She looks serious about doing just that!)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With her passion thoroughly<n>rekindled, Silence Suzuka
continually<n>produces amazing results with every<n>passing
day of training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Until, at last...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh, Air Groove! You decided to come<n>watch me?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Yes, I've been a little worried about<n>you.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Heh, though that look on your face<n>tells me that I didn't
have much cause<n>for concern.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. It's almost time for me to get<n>on the track. See you
soon.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Yeah. Have a good run.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Clear blue skies greet a new group of<n>emboldened Twinkle
Series hopefuls!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Each runner has entered her gate.<n>Their debut race starts
now!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Today's favorite to win, Silence<n>Suzuka, takes an early lead,
and with<n>unbelievable speed leaves everyone<n>else
behind.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
That Suzuka's incredible! Even as a<n>front runner, that's
some shocking<n>speed right from the get go!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, but don't forget, this is the<n>Twinkle Series! Can she
really win<n>with that kind of meathead strategy?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (It's still... so noisy. I need to go<n>farther!)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hngh!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Even in the last leg, Silence Suzuka<n>increases her speed!
She keeps<n>pulling away from the pack!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: No way... Can she really keep it up?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(I won't let anyone get in my way. I<n>won't give up the
lead!)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: This scenery... is mine alone!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka crosses the finish<n>with seven lengths to
spare! You<n>don't often see a front running<n>performance
like that!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Woooooooo!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Unbelievable, Suzuka! You're an<n>absolute monster!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Phew...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe, not quite.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The views will surely only get better<n>from here, Trainer!
